instructions.name: How to upload a BW ?
instructions.description: To ulpoad a BW file, follow these steps.

steps.description: Click the 'Add order' button.
On the "Add Order" page, click the "Choose file" button.
Select a file on your computer and click "Open".
Click the "Send" button and wait for the upload to process (up to 1 minute).
When the file is processed, you are redirected on the newly created order

Click on the 'Choose file' button and then select a file on your computer.
